conversations.reply_english: Good morning! Can you help me, please? I'm looking for some books for my mother.
conversations.reply_chinese: 早上好！你可以帮我吗？我在找一些书给我母亲。

conversations.english: Excuse me, could you tell me where you have got that music book?
conversations.chinese: 打扰了，你可以告诉我你在哪里找到那本音乐书的吗？
conversations.reply_english: Certainly. Let me see. Oh, it's on that self.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然可以。让我想想。噢，在那个书架上。

title: 你看完后能借我读一下这本书吗?

conversations.english: hi, Charlie! What are you reading?
conversations.reply_english: hi, bob. I’m reading a biography?
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗨，鲍勃。我在读一本自传。

title: 我们重新进货后马上通知你?

conversations.chinese: 先生，有什么可以帮忙吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I'd like a book about law.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我想找一本关于法律的书。

conversations.english: I need some books on hardware.
conversations.reply_english: There's many books here.What about these?
conversations.reply_chinese: 这儿有许多呢，这些需要吗？

title: 报纸和周刊只能够在阅览室阅读

conversations.english: I'm going to look for some reference books, newspapers and periodicals. Can we meet at the counter in 2 hours?
conversations.chinese: 我去找一些参考书、报纸和周刊。我们两个小时后在借书处见可以吗？

conversations.reply_english: Yes, I’m doing some research on Roman civilization. Do you have any books on the subject?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我在做一些关于罗马文明方面的研究，这方面有没有什么书？

conversations.english: Wow! Look at all these books! I bet I can find a book about anything here!
conversations.chinese: 哇！看这些书！我打赌在这里我总可以找到一本什么书。
conversations.reply_english: Shhh!! Please keep your voice down. There are people reading and studying here.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嘘！！声音小一点。大家都在这里看书和学习呢。

conversations.english: Could you please help me to check out the book?
conversations.reply_english: Sure, what's the author's name, please.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然可以啊，请告诉我作者的名字。

conversations.english: Excuse me, can you tell me the name of the book you read?
conversations.chinese: 不好意思，打扰一下，你能告诉我你看的是什么书吗？

title: 这本书已经超过了借阅期限

conversations.english: This is my admission card, and these are the books .
conversations.chinese: 这是我的借书卡，这些是书。
